character.noteList: Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest • Perception proficiency • Longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow proficiency • Can cast misty step (1/rest) Folk Hero Feature: • Commoners are willing to shelter you from some trouble Class Features: • Cleric Archetype: Life • Healing spells of at least 1st level heal an additional 2 + spell level • Turn Undead (see rules) • Preserve Life (see rules) • Heavy Armor Master: You take 3 less bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while in heavy armor and you gain +1 Str • Kill CR ½ undead that fail save vs turning ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Longswords, Shortswords, Shortbows, Longbows Simple Weapons ⊠One type of artisan's tools Vehicles (land) ⊠Common, Elvish ⊠mace shield holy symbol light crossbow + 20 bolts OR one simple weapon priest's pack OR explorer's pack set of artisan's tools shovel iron pot set of common clothes belt pouch chain mail ⊠⊠Cleric 5⊠Eladrin⊠Folk Hero⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Hello⊠Cleric 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
